Package pl.polsl.stasica.krystian.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.stasica.krystian.view.View
  • public class View
extends Object
    Class holds basic information about input, output file names and shift value Default values are allready set.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Krystian Stasica

      • readToFile

        public void readToFile​(ArrayList<String> lines,
                       String input)
                throws FileNotFoundErrorException,
                       IOException
        Method reads data from given file to an array list.
        Parameters:
        lines - - array list of text rows
        input - - input file name
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundErrorException - when file was not found
        IOException - throws when program can't locate path to file
